{PAWN_nameDef} can't understand why any sane adult would enjoy My Little Pony, and tends to dislike anyone who does. {PAWN_pronoun} will get a mood loss from equipping pony plushies.

{PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes pony xenotypes, and will find it abhorrent if turned into one.

Additionally, {PAWN_pronoun} has a lot of hatred for the three pony races.
